name: BAIKER Kerstin
research interest: Kerstin's research interests are broad and involve collaborative investigations of the pathogenesis of infectious and degenerative diseases, often with a focus on neuropathology and cardiopathology. Kerstin is one of the key members of the international 'Ape Heart Project' in Europe, trying to better understand great ape heart diseases, a significant cause of death among great apes.
